title: DriveWorks Node parameter value sets Descriptor
description: The descriptor of sets of parameter values for DriveWorks nodes. The order of sets should be alphabetical.

^([a-ZA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]*|\\*)$.description: The key is the set identifier. The value contains a mapping from parameter names to parameter values. The order of parameter names should be alphabetical.

^([a-z][a-zA-Z0-9_]*(\\.[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9_.description: The key is the parameter name from the node. The value is the parameter value which must match the type of the parameter defined in the node descriptor.
